In a message dated 7/3/2004 11:40:22 AM Eastern Daylight Time, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@...> writes:

>Nakajima Nobori's mom "My son is sooo talented (brings out stacks 
>and stacks of papers) see he drew all of his siblings, the entire 
>family, all of his playmates, the entire village etc."
>
>PMK Yamazaki's mom "he always loved to play dress up with Ayunee..."
>
>Hist. Yamazaki "he was an extremely shy boy and whenever guests came 
>to visit he would observe them from various hiding places...but I'm 
>so proud that he learned to write so fast! He just had so much fun 
>taking down notes on all of our visitors. ï¿½If he really likes a 
>guest he may even ask them questions like 'where are you 
>from''what's your REAL name' and so forth but he tended to get 
>impatient when they didn't take his questions seriously."
>
>Hist. Saitou's mom "all the kids want to play 'house' but he always 
>insists that they play 'guard the castle'"
>
>


Historical Hijikata's mom: "None of the neighborhood kids liked to play games with little Toshizo. He was such a stickler for the rules!"

Historical Kondo's mom: "Everytime we turned around a group of the neighborhood kid's was coming to his father complaining about his 'haughty attitude'!"

-MissBehavin
